COVID-19 MACHINE LEARNING DATA ANALYSIS

COVID-19 (Sars Cov 2) virus spread analysis and diagnosis from radiography

By Bui Quang Bao
Analysis, the process of turning raw data into insights, can provide us with a view of how Coronavirus disease influences the communities, indicate if the development of a country affects its virus spread as well as the infection rate, the death rate and the recovered rate. Diagnosis method is significant in preventing the spread of the pandemic. With the dataset of chest X-ray, we can build a ML model to predict if a new X-ray image is from COVID-19 infected or non-infected.
⤷ Full Article ⤷ Dataset ⤷ Jupyter Python File
